medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain onset occurred 48 hours ago after eating breakfast. Prior to the visit, the patient experienced discomfort in the RUQ area, which did not radiate to the back. Similar attack experienced 3 weeks ago.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Rheumatoid arthritis, anemia, history of gastric ulcer, history of positive PPD, history of ectopic pregnancy, laparoscopic repair, and laparoscopic tubal ligation.
